mapper.select: select oi.product_id, oi.product_name, sum(oi.quantity) as total_quantity from order_item oi inner join orders o on o.id = oi.order_id where o.created_at between #{startDate} and #{endDate} group by oi.product_id, oi.product_name, order by total_quantity desc limit #{limit}
mapper.insert: insert into orders (user_id, username, first_name, last_name, amount) values (#{userId}, #{username}, #{firstName}, #{lastName}, #{amount})
insert into order_item (order_id, product_id, product_name, product_price, quantity) values (#{orderId}, #{productId}, #{productName}, #{productPrice}, #{quantity})
